paper.title: The design, implementation and operation of an email pseudonym server

author.org: MIT Laboratory for Computer Science, 545 Technology Square, Cambridge MA

paper.abstract: Attacks on servers that provide anonymity generally fall into two categories: attempts to expose anonymous users and attempts to silence them. Much existing work concentrates on withstanding the former, but the threat of the latter is equally real.
